title: A nice CONDENSED Typeface
content:
with equally well crafted Numbers is what one needs...i’m thinking down the Trade Gothic direction but thee is a few fonts short of a full Trade typeface..

Is there anything similar out there?

 [‹ Pair with Neo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122053248/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47761 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122053248/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36610 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sok_
